backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for CertiPrep AI backend, managing certifications, domains, objectives, questions, flashcards, test results, PDF progress, and user profiles with access control and approval mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (card borders, theme toggle, uniform card sizing, A+ card standardization) to their affected files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON dictionary of concise per-file summaries for all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key behaviors of each page, component, hook, and config file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes, covering background, foreground, card, border, chart, and sidebar color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the CertiPrep AI React app, mounting the root div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/public/study-materials/comptia-: Self-contained CompTIA A+ study guide HTML file with dark-themed styling, covering Core 1 and Core 2 exam domains, port references, CLI commands, and exam tips.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that defines all TanStack Router routes (dashboard, certifications, study, practice, flashcards, test, study-materials) wrapped in a shared Layout.
frontend/src/components/FlashcardDeck.ts: Flashcard UI component with flip animation, showing front/back content and correct/incorrect action buttons that only appear after the card is flipped.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Defines the main app layout with a sticky header, navigation links (Dashboard, Certifications, Study Materials), a dark/light theme toggle persisted to localStorage, and a mobile nav bar.
frontend/src/components/PDFViewer.tsx: A modal PDF/HTML viewer component that tracks and persists reading scroll progress (as a percentage) to the backend, with debounced saves and scroll position restoration for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/VoiceControls.ts: A UI component that exposes text-to-speech and speech recognition controls, including a mic toggle, speaking/listening status indicators, and a collapsible settings panel for voice, rate, and pitch.
frontend/src/data/certifications.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and a static data array for CompTIA certifications, including exam metadata and detailed domain breakdowns with objectives, key terms, ports, protocols, and study notes.
frontend/src/data/studyMaterials.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and a static array mapping CompTIA certifications to their associated HTML study guide file paths, descriptions, and display colors.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using TanStack Query, handling both anonymous and authenticated (Internet Identity) cases, and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and AuthClient creation with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on flashcards, questions, test results, and reading progress, each interacting with the backend actor and invalidating relevant query caches on mutation.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Recognition API to provide start/stop controls, live transcript state, and interim results for voice input.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechSynthesis.ts: Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Synthesis API that ranks and selects English voices, strips markdown from text before speaking, and exposes speak/stop controls with configurable rate and pitch.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that sets up Tailwind CSS, defines CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using OKLCH colors, and adds shared component styles like certification card sizing and badge color variants.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationSelector: Page component that displays a grid of CompTIA certification cards (A+, Security+, Network+, etc.) with metadata like difficulty, domains, and exam codes, linking each to its detail page.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Renders the main dashboard page displaying a grid of CompTIA certification cards, each showing cert metadata and the user's latest test score fetched via useGetTestResults.
frontend/src/pages/Flashcards.tsx: Implements a three-phase (setup, study, review) flashcard study session for a given certification, supporting both AI-generated and saved cards with correct/incorrect tracking.
frontend/src/pages/PracticeTest.tsx: Provides a timed (30-minute) multiple-choice practice test for a certification, handling question generation, answer selection, submission, score calculation, and results review.
frontend/src/pages/QAPractice.tsx: Offers an untimed Q&A practice quiz with optional domain filtering, showing per-question feedback and a final review summary of passed/failed answers.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMaterials.tsx: Displays a grid of certification study material cards with reading progress indicators, and opens a PDFViewer component when a material is selected.
frontend/src/pages/StudyMode.tsx: A chat-based study mode page that lets users converse with a simulated instructor about a specific certification domain, supporting text and voice input/output with context-aware responses based on domain data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL query parameters (supporting both standard and hash-based routing), persisting them to sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color palettes (navy, amber, electric, semantic tokens via OKLCH CSS variables), typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state (version 3) for a CompTIA certification study app, listing existing features, known UI issues, and architectural notes about card standardization fixes in progress.
